column4: So I'm setting up ubuntu for my eight year old sister.  I will be going back to uni soon.  Is tunneling X over ssh the best way for me to be able to remotely fix problems?
Also, any tips for setting it up for a kid?
use edubuntu ( colorfull defaul theme etc ...) plain ssh should be enough for many problems
you can install the edubuntu metapackages after install too
